com.marcolotz.imageprocess

Class GrayNoduleCandidates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcolotz.imageprocess.ImageProcessingClass
      • com.marcolotz.imageprocess.GrayNoduleCandidates

  • public class GrayNoduleCandidates
extends ImageProcessingClass
    Node Candidates Detector based in Gray level plugin. Once the Lung is extracted from the original image, it uses gray scale analysis to find possible components that are Node candidates. Since the input image has the same 16-bits depth of the original DICOM, the grey level convertion is done using a rule of three. The candidates will only be taken as a nodule in a post-processing phase, using the criteria defined in the 2003 paper.
    Author:
    Marco Aurelio Lotz
